t:
The old man mended
his garden, spreading
home made fertilizer
and cursing his failing
memory.


“Eyes are good for your carrots,” he tried to remember, “or am I saying it backwards?”
c:
#eyes #fertilizer #garden #oldage #forgetfulness #mistake #crime #carrot



Explanation: The old man can't remember if 'carrots are good for your eyes'? He thinks that maybe eyes are good for carrots. In his brain, the concept of 'human eye' and 'carrot' have swapped places. Hence, he spreads some HOMEMADE fertilizer, containing human eyes.
